snippet: The oil company cited regulatory uncertainties in announcing that it would not drill in Alaskan waters in 2014.
abstract: ConocoPhillips says it is suspending its plans to drill in Alaskan Arctic waters in 2014 because of uncertainties over federal regulatory and permitting standards.
lead_paragraph: The oil company cited regulatory uncertainties in announcing that it would not drill in Alaskan waters in 2014.

headline.main: ConocoPhillips Suspends Its Arctic Drilling Plans
headline.print_headline: ConocoPhillips Suspends Its Arctic Drilling Plans
